name: options
description: The options to display as radio buttons.

name: aria-label
description: Accessible label for the radio group.

name: aria-labelledby
description: ID of the element that labels this radio group.

name: className
description: Additional CSS classes for the root element.

name: color
description: The color scheme of the radio buttons.

name: defaultValue
description:
The uncontrolled value of the radio button that should be initially selected.

To render a controlled radio group, use the `value` prop instead.

name: disabled
description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

name: name
description: Identifies the field when a form is submitted.

name: orientation
description: The layout orientation of the radio group.

name: size
description: The size of the radio buttons.

name: value
description:
The controlled value of the radio item that should be currently selected.

To render an uncontrolled radio group, use the `defaultValue` prop instead.

name: variant
description: The visual style of the radio buttons.
